programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: A spree of murders shocks Victorian England — and the world. The homicidal maniac responsible remains a mystery. Can history's most notorious serial killer ever be identified? Who is Jack the Ripper?

programme.desc: A duo of highly skilled thieves who specialise in hotel jobs go after the biggest target of their careers: New York's famed Pierre Hotel.

programme.desc: This week's challengers tackle a complicated build; crafting a working oven from all natural materials, like sand, wood and water.

programme.desc: The Laginas head to Texas with Matty Blake to help treasure hunter Hoppy Eubanks and his team search for the legendary lost San Saba Mine and over one billion dollars in silver.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23)
programme.desc: Chum goes for a hole-in-one when a signed Jack Nicklaus golf glove swings into the shop. Meanwhile, Corey targets a GI Joe Tomahawk helicopter toy. Will he get to be a real American hero?

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1)
programme.desc: Two thieves dressed as fake cops make off with a half-billion dollars' worth of world-class artwork from a Boston museum. Although the paintings remain missing, numerous suspects turn up dead.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S10)
programme.desc: Four smiths get cooking when they are tasked with forging a chef's knife. After a round of testing performed by a professional chef, only two head back to their home forge to build a brutal hog splitter.

programme.title: Alone (S9)
programme.desc: As the days march on, the participants look for new ways to hunt and to preserve their food sources. One survivalist leans on a taxing shelter build, while another pauses for some sustenance.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S8)
programme.desc: Four smiths hit the fast track in a race to make a damascus blade with the highest layer count. The stakes could not be higher: the winner will get extra time, while the loser will be eliminated.

programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2)
programme.desc: Adam thinks he's getting his revenge on Rob for selecting tarantulas earlier this season by programming Rob's phobia of centipedes.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: When the son of an aviation legend is snatched from his crib at home, it ignites a media firestorm. After a nationwide manhunt, the culprit is brought to justice. But did the authorities get the right man?

programme.title: Ride N' Seek: Quest For The Priestess' Cloak
programme.desc: Jaime makes way to the Philippines' Queen City of Cebu, where she conquers its roaring canyons, calms her nerves with some pythons, and harnesses her fighting skills in the country's first battleground.

programme.title: Ride N' Seek: Quest For The Priestess' Cloak
programme.desc: In the majestic island of Bohol, Jaime sharpens her blacksmithing skills, follows in the steps of a resolute underground revolutionary, and learns a dying language crafted from human body parts.

programme.title: The Pickers (S18)
programme.desc: In New Mexico, Mike and Danielle make an epic stagecoach stop and visit a frozen-in-time adobe village complete with ghost stories and a Wild West saloon.

programme.title: Skip and Loafer
programme.desc: Mitsumi is nominated as the student council's secretary. Takamine-senpai loses and becomes vice-president. Looking at how defeated Takamine-senpai is, Kanechika-senpai comes up with an idea.

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: The Hero Academy battles the dragons without Anos' help. Meanwhile, Lay and Misa are being captured by Licius…. At the Underground World, Anos learns that Ahide is controlling the Dragonmen.

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Anos and Ahide clash. Ahide possesses Arcana and drops the trial of the Sword of the Omnipotent upon Anos. Ahide can be killed with the sword, but the wielder's source will be destroyed…

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
programme.desc: Sariphi struggles with her first task as the queen's representative due to the Queen of Sabre, Karkala's interference. Just then, the Fourth Princess, Tetra, appears with a solution.

programme.title: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
programme.desc: Leonhart is unable to accompany Sariphi on her next task as queen's representative. While putting together a personal guard for Sariphi, one demonfolk steps up and volunteers himself.

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: After failing her infiltration, Foll freeloads in Zagan's castle. Zagan brings her to Marchosias's castle, where they learn something new about the Archdemon seals and Twelve Holy Swords…

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: The slow-moving but heart-fluttering romcom between Zagan, a socially inept and foul-mouthed sorcerer, and Nephy, a beautiful white-haired elf girl from an underground auction, begins!

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: With Mujika and Sonju's guidance, Emma and the children learn the ways of survival. To reach “B06-32”, they trek through a wasteland but find nothing upon reaching there.

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: The telephone suddenly rings. It's a pre-recorded call from William Minerva. Through the recording, the children learn about the truth. Meanwhile, Isabella is offered a chance at freedom.

programme.title: The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio
programme.desc: Yuhi and Yasumi host a radio programme as a close-knit voice actor and classmate duo. But the truth is, they're complete opposites who hate each other! What awaits in their difficult path?

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: The team traveling to the past to meet Tsade gather at the manor, where Sein and Walter learn about Tsade's ability and its meaning. Meanwhile, a girls' night is happening at Alice's room.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: Bocchan finally meets the witch who cursed him—Tsade. Alice's mother, Sharon, awakens from her eternal slumber. The story between Bocchan and Alice finally reaches a conclusion...!

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: The group arrives at Atami. Trying to give Shozo and Ine alone time, Mino and Shota end up sharing a room. The next day, Shozo turns old again, but enjoys his time at the beach with Ine.

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: Shozo and Ine, an old loving couple, return to their youth after eating a mysterious apple! While spending their days being close like always, the lovebirds are more energetic than before...!

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Anos and Ahide clash. Ahide possesses Arcana and drops the trial of the Sword of the Omnipotent upon Anos. Ahide can be killed with the sword, but the wielder's source will be destroyed…

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] 2nd SEASON -The Eve of Awakening-
programme.desc: Iroha and Madoka's party struggle to fight their friends Tsuruno and Mami, who are now under Magius' control. Meanwhile, a large supercell is approaching and its true form is the Walpurgis Night.

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] 2nd SEASON -The Eve of Awakening-
programme.desc: After Iroha and the others defeat Tsuruno, Toka drives her anger towards them. Iroha wakes up in an unfamiliar world and remembers the past.

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] FINAL SEASON -Dawn of a Shallow Dream-
programme.desc: The final season of the MAGIA RECORD SERIES. What conclusion awaits all the Magical Girls who continue to fight for each of their wishes…?

programme.title: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA SIDE STORY [MAGIA RECORD] FINAL SEASON -Dawn of a Shallow Dream-
programme.desc: The final season of the MAGIA RECORD SERIES. What conclusion awaits all the Magical Girls who continue to fight for each of their wishes…?

programme.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND Season 2
programme.desc: With Mujika and Sonju's guidance, Emma and the children learn the ways of survival. To reach “B06-32”, they trek through a wasteland but find nothing upon reaching there.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: The second school term begins. Tomozaki begins to take interest in his surroundings while Aoi brings up the next task. How will Tomozaki deal with the girl on the top of the class hierarchy?

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: With Aoi, Yuzu, and Mizusawa's help, Tomozaki succeeds at getting Erika motivated on sports day. While he immerses himself in the positive vibes in class, Erika is up to something bad…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Hanabi becomes Erika's new bullying target. Their arguments persist as their classmates grow tired of Hanabi's obliviousness. With Tomozaki's advice, Hanabi attempts to change herself…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Tomozaki proposes for Hanabi to blend in better with their classmates. Hanabi shows some improvement with Mizusawa, Takei and Fuka's help. Meanwhile, Aoi doesn't wish for Hanabi to change…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Hanabi reaches a breaking point after seeing her keychain being damaged. Later, Erika finds her desk toppled. The mood turns dark, and Tomozaki realizes that someone is manipulating it…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Tomozaki asks Aoi about what she did to Erika. While Tomozaki remains unsettled about Aoi's decision to exact revenge, peace returns and preparation for the cultural festival is underway.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Tomozaki proposes an original play for the cultural festival and is made the director. While working on Aoi's assignment to take photos with everyone, Tomozaki invites Mimimi to a meal.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Mizusawa and Tomozaki go to an all-girls school cultural festival. Tomozaki is impressed by Mizusawa's social skill. While being asked about himself, Tomozaki replies pessimistically…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Hesitant about Mimimi's confession, Tomozaki thinks pessimistically, but Mizusawa offers him advice. Aoi presses Tomozaki to give an answer, and he names the two girls he is interested in…

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: The cast for the play is decided. Tomozaki and Mimimi decide to face their feelings head-on. While going through the revised script, Tomozaki and Fuuka get stuck at the character, Alcia.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Rehearsals for the play begin. Through the play, Fuuka attempts to change herself. Meanwhile, Tomozaki prepares for the comedy act. Fuuka finishes the story's ending, but it is unexpected.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: Fuuka chose a sad ending for the play. After talking to Tomozaki about what he did in the past six months, she tries to write a new ending. The cultural festival begins.

programme.title: Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki 2nd Stage
programme.desc: The stage play begins. As the story reaches its climax, a scene Tomozaki is unaware of, featuring "A letter from Chris", begins. That is none other than, a message from Fuuka to Tomozaki...

programme.title: Lycoris Recoil
programme.desc: Chisato brings Takina out shopping, and reveals her reason for becoming a Lycoris.

programme.title: Lycoris Recoil
programme.desc: Chisato and Takina escort their new client around Tokyo, but someone seems to be on their tail. During their mission, Takina also learns a shocking fact about Chisato.

programme.desc: Kinjo successfully transitions to Momose's company with Aoyama as his mentor. Momose, Shirosaki, Aoyama and Kinjo decide to go out for drinks. Can Momose manage to get drunk at this party?

programme.title: My New Boss Is Goofy
programme.desc: Momose and Shirosaki head to a hot spring inn, while Aoyama and Kinjo go to a day trip to "Kumatte Land". It begins to rain heavily when Aoyama and Kinjo return, and Kinjo catches a cold.

programme.title: Kemono Michi: Rise Up
programme.desc: After Kemona Mask disappears amidst their match, MAO falls into depression. Shigure wants Genzo to clear some quests but the man wants nothing but to frolic with his pets at home.

programme.title: Kemono Michi: Rise Up
programme.desc: MAO is summoned to another world by Joanna. In the past, Joanna's servant, Rose, once defeated Camilla which resulted in Hanako having to suffer from a humiliating treatment…

programme.desc: Atsushi agrees to let Teruko meet Ranpo, but something seems off. Meanwhile, Sigma has had enough of Dazai, who doesn't seem to be interested in escaping the prison.

programme.desc: When Alice cannot get Iska off her mind, Rin suggests they meet to settle things once and for all. Meanwhile, Iska's party receives a high-level order to infiltrate the Nebulis Sovereignty.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: The team traveling to the past to meet Tsade gather at the manor, where Sein and Walter learn about Tsade's ability and its meaning. Meanwhile, a girls' night is happening at Alice's room.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
programme.desc: Bocchan finally meets the witch who cursed him—Tsade. Alice's mother, Sharon, awakens from her eternal slumber. The story between Bocchan and Alice finally reaches a conclusion...!

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: The group arrives at Atami. Trying to give Shozo and Ine alone time, Mino and Shota end up sharing a room. The next day, Shozo turns old again, but enjoys his time at the beach with Ine.

programme.title: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
programme.desc: Shozo and Ine, an old loving couple, return to their youth after eating a mysterious apple! While spending their days being close like always, the lovebirds are more energetic than before...!

programme.title: Fire Force Season 2
programme.desc: Shinra makes an important discovery about how to fight Charon, but incorporating a new hand form into his fighting style proves difficult.

programme.title: Fire Force Season 2
programme.desc: Inca is faced with the decision of whether to go with Shinra and the Fire Force, or to go with Charon and side with the Evangelist. The 8th launches a research expedition to find answers.

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: The slow-moving but heart-fluttering romcom between Zagan, a socially inept and foul-mouthed sorcerer, and Nephy, a beautiful white-haired elf girl from an underground auction, begins!

programme.title: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
programme.desc: The slow-moving but heart-fluttering romcom between Zagan, a socially inept and foul-mouthed sorcerer, and Nephy, a beautiful white-haired elf girl from an underground auction, begins!

programme.title: CESTVS -The Roman Fighter-
programme.desc: After his defeat against Ruska, Cestvs is given a chance to live as he swears to become stronger. Cestvs visits Pompei with the Drisco Boxing Troup, where he faces Emden, the strongest slave fighter of Pompei.

programme.title: CESTVS -The Roman Fighter-
programme.desc: While Sabina proposes to buy over Cestvs, the boy rejects her offer and declares that he will redeem himself by his own power. Sabina orders Emden to beat Cestvs up in a match.

programme.title: takt op. Destiny
programme.desc: The D2 begins to awaken and terrorize towns and their people. Amidst the rising threat of the D2, Takt is immersed in his own thoughts.

programme.title: takt op. Destiny
programme.desc: After learning the truth of Cosette's death, Takt charges at Shindler in rage. He gets heavily injured by Hell, and a whole new emotion wells up within Destiny―

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS
programme.desc: After W.I.N.G., the idols of 283 Production go through their documentary and reflect on their efforts and results and determine what they should do in the future.

programme.title: THE iDOLM@STER SHINYCOLORS
programme.desc: 283 Production announces its first live performance featuring all groups. Amid rising anticipation and busy schedules, the idols of 283 Production come together and prepare for the event.

programme.desc: Yuhi and Yasumi host a radio programme as a close-knit voice actor and classmate duo. But the truth is, they're complete opposites who hate each other! What awaits in their difficult path?

programme.title: Fire Force Season 2
programme.desc: The seven member team reaches the Chinese Peninsula to find the cause of the Great Cataclysm and Adolla Bursts. But there's a strange gas in the air that's making them behave erratically.

programme.title: Fire Force Season 2
programme.desc: Scop tells the team about a mysterious woman who taught him how to speak, and who repaired the Tabernacle. The team's mission takes a turn when intelligent Infernals show up at the Oasis.

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Anos and Ahide clash. Ahide possesses Arcana and drops the trial of the Sword of the Omnipotent upon Anos. Ahide can be killed with the sword, but the wielder's source will be destroyed…

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Ⅱ: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants

programme.desc: A tiny chameleon faces the journey of a lifetime in a Madagascan forest, and a water vole in Scotland swims across a loch and scales a mountain to find new territory and a mate.

programme.title: Australia's Sleep Revolution with Michael Mosley (S1)
programme.desc: Dr Michael Mosley travels to Australia to enlist in a world-first, two-month sleep treatment program at the Flinders University Sleep Institute.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka (S1)
programme.desc: Xander has a close-up encounter with a cobra, and travels north to Tamil country where he helps dig up mines remaining after the bitter civil war that raged for 30 years.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World (S1)
programme.desc: Budgets are dwindling and the intensity of the race is stepping up as the teams leave western Europe behind.

programme.title: Toubab
programme.desc: Soon after being released from prison, Babtou gets in trouble with the law again. Facing deportation to his foreign birthplace he’s never been to, he and his friend Dennis are willing to do anything to stay in the only home they've ever known: Frankfurt.

programme.title: A Summer in Greece
programme.desc: On her first trip as driver, Rieke loses her company’s new coach. Faced with the risk of getting fired, she travels across Greece in search of it. Along the way, she meets the suave Yannis, who’s about to help her in more ways than she’s ever imagined.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Melissa
programme.desc: A thriller film about a domestically abused 9-year-old girl, Melissa, forming a bond with her captor after being kidnapped.

programme.title: LUV
programme.desc: Set in the Baltimore crime world, a fatherless eleven-year-old boy learns about adulthood when he spends a day with his ex-convict uncle whom he idolizes. He becomes witness to the ugliness of drug dealings and the haunting pain of past mistakes in life.

programme.title: East Frisian: Fire
programme.desc: Detectives Klaasen and Weller's are finally getting married. But their honeymoon is cut short when a corpse is found in bonfire ashes. As bodies pile up, they chase a serial killer through a town celebrating Easter, unraveling a dark mystery.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Welcome At Esposito's
programme.desc: Tonino Esposito is the worst mafia boss that ever walked the earth, but when he finds out that his daughter is dating the son of a public attorney, he finally gets the chance to prove his worth to the family and the whole city of Naples.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: After The Storm
programme.desc: After a celebration in her rural hometown, Karla Petersen is murdered on her way home. Inspector Helen Dorn takes on the case but clashes with local officer Tom Petersen, Karla's brother, who defies warnings to find his sister's killer.

programme.title: Welcome At Esposito's
programme.desc: Tonino Esposito is the worst mafia boss that ever walked the earth, but when he finds out that his daughter is dating the son of a public attorney, he finally gets the chance to prove his worth to the family and the whole city of Naples.

programme.title: 180 Degree Rule
programme.desc: Sara, a schoolteacher from Tehran, is preparing to attend a wedding in northern Iran with her family. When her husband suddenly forbids her from going, she hatches a plan to go in secret. But her choice soon places her on a painful path to atonement.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: A Summer in Iceland
programme.desc: Young Jette flies to Iceland to settle her aunt Rosalie’s ashes in its final resting place. Armed only with Rosalie’s diary, she learns about her aunt’s hidden life of love and survival. Unbeknownst to Jette, her own love story is about to begin too!

programme.title: My Brothers
programme.desc: In this heart-warming Irish road movie, three young brothers take to the streets in a stolen bakery van to replace their dying father’s watch. Headed for Ballybunion, they are quickly side-tracked by a medley of hilarious mishaps and quirky oddballs.

programme.title: Train Driver's Diary
programme.desc: As Ilija nears retirement, his record of unintentional deaths as a train driver weighs heavy. His adopted son, Sima, fears following in his footsteps. But as days pass without incident, Ilija's determination to ensure Sima's success takes a dark turn.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy

programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling they’ve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling they’ve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the naïve Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: Storm Warning
programme.desc: During a ferocious storm, two teenagers lose sight of the 10-year-old boy they’re babysitting and he disappears – never to be found. 20 years later, the news of the murder of their high-school teacher forces them to confront their traumas and old wounds.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parent’s and Irene’s marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: Wonderfully Beautiful
programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: Aakansha
programme.desc: A taxi driver converses with a sketch artist, and unveils his own past hardships through the stories of the passengers he drives around. Reflecting on the similar choices they took, he ponders the different life he could have had.

programme.title: A House In Jerusalem
programme.desc: Grappling with the loss of her mother, Rebecca and her father relocate to Jerusalem for a fresh start. In the eerie Valley of the Ghosts, strange occurrences unfold, and Rebecca embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries within the old house and city.

programme.title: Greta's Wedding
programme.desc: Greta is set to marry in a week. Shortly before the big day, she discovers that her divorce papers with her ex-husband have a legal mistake. She goes to great lengths to rectify it – but little does she know that her life will be derailed in ways unimagined.

programme.title: Birth of a Champion
programme.desc: In 1984 Germany, a hot-headed teenage Boris Becker has but one goal: to play tennis in the big leagues, and to be the best at it. Despite his temper, he is scouted by coach Günther Bosch, who sees the future Wimbledon champion for what he is.

programme.title: Light Years (II)
programme.desc: Three siblings that have grown apart, find themselves forcibly reunited as they need to sell off their childhood home. They embark on a journey to their hometown in their father’s old car, and the road home forces them to confront their buried conflicts.

programme.title: Blood Pressure
programme.desc: Nicole, a 41-year-old wife bored with her mundane life, receives letters from a mysterious observer. Enticed, she plays along but they soon get out of hand and threaten to tear apart her relationship with her husband and two teenage children.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Cookbook Of Love
programme.desc: Jule, a culinary lover, is planning a big move to New York to join her boyfriend, Ole. Her mother tries to stop her from leaving and resorts to creative tactics – not least, bribing a TV chef to “steal” her heart through cooking.

programme.title: Storm Warning
programme.desc: During a ferocious storm, two teenagers lose sight of the 10-year-old boy they’re babysitting and he disappears – never to be found. 20 years later, the news of the murder of their high-school teacher forces them to confront their traumas and old wounds.

programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Jeff Bezos
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Mark Zuckerberg
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Aerial America - Man Made Marvels
programme.desc: Swoop over America’s biggest, boldest, and most dazzling man-made structures. From the Statue of Liberty to the Seattle Space Needle, these American symbols of creativity rival the vast beauty of the country’s landscape.

programme.title: Sacred Sites - Petra
programme.desc: In Jordan and Saudi Arabia lie the remains of Petra and Hegra, 2,000-year-old cities built by the Nabataeans. New discoveries within their tombs and temples have revealed that women ruled this ancient civilization with unrivalled power for centuries.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - El Loco
programme.desc: New Leeds United owner Andrea Radrizzani has a mission: To take Leeds United back to the Premier League. But first he must find a new head coach capable of fulfilling the clubs supporters dreams.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: Leeds United must overcome a mounting injury crisis and show fighting spirit to maintain their challenge for promotion. Fanatical Leeds fan Josh Warrington faces Carl Frampton for IBF World Title.

programme.title: Beyonce & Jay-Z: Power Love
programme.desc: A merger of megastar music. Discover the true story of multi-genre performer and fashion promoter, Beyonce Knowles and the world's first hip hop billionaire, Jay-Z.

programme.title: Adele: A New Chapter
programme.desc: Adele is a 15-time Grammy Award-winning artist whose soulful sound has thrust her into the limelight. Through her own words, video and live performances, take an incredible look at the life and times of one of the greatest artists of all time.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Jeff Bezos
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Mark Zuckerberg
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - El Loco
programme.desc: New Leeds United owner Andrea Radrizzani has a mission: To take Leeds United back to the Premier League. But first he must find a new head coach capable of fulfilling the clubs supporters dreams.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: Leeds United must overcome a mounting injury crisis and show fighting spirit to maintain their challenge for promotion. Fanatical Leeds fan Josh Warrington faces Carl Frampton for IBF World Title.

programme.title: Beyonce & Jay-Z: Power Love
programme.desc: A merger of megastar music. Discover the true story of multi-genre performer and fashion promoter, Beyonce Knowles and the world's first hip hop billionaire, Jay-Z.

programme.title: Adele: A New Chapter
programme.desc: Adele is a 15-time Grammy Award-winning artist whose soulful sound has thrust her into the limelight. Through her own words, video and live performances, take an incredible look at the life and times of one of the greatest artists of all time.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Jeff Bezos
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Sacred Sites - Petra
programme.desc: In Jordan and Saudi Arabia lie the remains of Petra and Hegra, 2,000-year-old cities built by the Nabataeans. New discoveries within their tombs and temples have revealed that women ruled this ancient civilization with unrivalled power for centuries.

programme.title: Sacred Sites - Templars
programme.desc: During their tumultuous two centuries in power, the Knights Templar were more scandalous than any Hollywood script. Journey into Jerusalem’s Temple Mount, where DNA tests and Vatican discoveries are revealing this secret society’s spectacular fall.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S2 - Jacob Jordaens: Renaissance Watercolours
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at the V&A, a suit from glam rockers Slade needs some TLC, a Michelangelo gives up its secrets and a rare Renaissance watercolour requires urgent attention.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S2 - Epic Iran
programme.desc: Some of the largest paintings ever seen at the V&A are unveiled, Manuel’s costume from Fawlty Towers goes on show, and the museum’s oldest teddy bear has a special visitor.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Climate Change And Me
programme.desc: Lara Dungan speaks with homeowners who have had their coastal residences ruined by erosion and coastal flooding. She’ll meet with experts who outline the bigger picture of climate change.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Seaweed Matters
programme.desc: Anja Murray discovers the amazing variety and ecology of seaweed around Irish coasts. Long harvested by local communities along our west coast, seaweed has now become a valuable resource worldwide.

programme.title: Eco Eye - Climate Friendly Living

programme.title: Sacred Sites - Oracles
programme.desc: Earthquake lights, hallucinogenic gases, and magnetic fields occurred nearly everywhere ancient Greek oracles delivered their prophecies. Voyage to the Mediterranean to investigate the connection between these soothsayer sites and tectonic phenomena.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP17
programme.desc: Kicking off in beautiful Detroit, we meet a local foodie and try some hipster fare. Then off to Cleveland Ohio where we sink our teeth into some amazing barbecue.Then we’ll sample the best chicken and waffles Cleveland has to offer.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP18
programme.desc: Head into the hot American desert to try Cuban food at the magnificent Scott Resort. Then on to the Vegas strip and taste some mouth watering steak. and we eat some magnificent tortilla’s from the back of a food truck.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP19
programme.desc: We check out what food the Bay Area has to offer, catching up with a local FM morning radio host and try some local fare in Palo Alto and then off to Oakland to visit an American Diner with a Japanese influence.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP20
programme.desc: Comfort food, American style. We try hearty burgers at a hipster burger joint in Washington DC, dumplings made from an age-old home recipe from a Chinese mum in Denver, Colorado and enjoy some comfort food from a lofty American brasserie.

programme.title: Off-Menu - Amsterdam & Paris
programme.desc: As the capital of the Netherlands, Amsterdam is home to a plethora of historic sights and culinary delights. Paris can feel anchored in another time, while a dynamic food scene keeps evolving.

programme.title: Off-Menu - Dublin & Copenhagen
programme.desc: In Dublin, verdant fields yield impeccable produce, and the coastal waters offer the finest seafood. Copenhagen's food scene caters to all, and it is high quality, locally sourced, and globally inspired.

programme.title: Off-Menu - Barcelona & Rome
programme.desc: Barcelona is defined by quirky architecture, imaginative food and vibrant street life. "Cucina Romana," is unique to Rome and vastly different from every other part of Italy.

programme.title: Off-Menu - New York & D.C.
programme.desc: NYC's numerous urban and ethnic clusters have greatly influenced its food and culture. Washington, D.C. is home to all three branches of the government — but it’s not all politics and power suits.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Street Food
programme.desc: Jimmy gets a taste of Darwin's popular street food from the stalls of the Parap Saturday market; Jimmy discusses Darwin's laksa obsession.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Meat
programme.desc: Jimmy checks out the landscapes of Kakadu; he chats with traditional owner Mandy Muir who takes Jimmy to see her country on a boat trip along the Yellow Waters.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Fresh Produce
programme.desc: Jimmy heads to the bustling Rapid Creek markets, mingling amongst the food stalls, produce growers, and locals out for their weekly shop.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory - Flavour
programme.desc: Jimmy meets some of the Greek community preparing food for the Greek cultural festival; he visits the colourful Malak Night Market.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - El Loco
programme.desc: New Leeds United owner Andrea Radrizzani has a mission: To take Leeds United back to the Premier League. But first he must find a new head coach capable of fulfilling the clubs supporters dreams.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: Leeds United must overcome a mounting injury crisis and show fighting spirit to maintain their challenge for promotion. Fanatical Leeds fan Josh Warrington faces Carl Frampton for IBF World Title.

programme.title: Beyonce & Jay-Z: Power Love
programme.desc: A merger of megastar music. Discover the true story of multi-genre performer and fashion promoter, Beyonce Knowles and the world's first hip hop billionaire, Jay-Z.

programme.title: Adele: A New Chapter
programme.desc: Adele is a 15-time Grammy Award-winning artist whose soulful sound has thrust her into the limelight. Through her own words, video and live performances, take an incredible look at the life and times of one of the greatest artists of all time.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Jeff Bezos
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Titans Of Tech - The Billionaires Who Made Our World: Mark Zuckerberg
programme.desc: Each one-hour documentary utilises rare archive footage and asks fundamental and serious questions about the personalities’ public facade and their businesses.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Above And Beyond Loyal
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 2
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Instinct; The Sixth Sense Part 1
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Critical Sight
programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Breeding Season
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands - Rivalry Time
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Rainforest
programme.desc: Rainforests cover just six percent of Earth's surface yet contain almost half of the world's plants and animals. With a diversity of mammals, birds, and bugs unrivaled almost anywhere in the world, Panama's Barro Colorado Island is the perfect microcosm of nature. Every year, passionate and dedicated scientists gather to this oasis of life, scaling the treetops, from canopy to forest floor, in an attempt to unlock the secrets of the rainforest. Follow them as they explore how life thrives in one of the most complex habitats on Earth.

programme.title: Creatures Of The Lagoon
programme.desc: Marine biologists explore Florida’s Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Orangutan Baby Birth
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Two Hooks Turtle
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes - Kiwi Egg Harvest
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Spring
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Summer
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Aerial America - Puerto Rico & The US Virgin Islands
programme.desc: Explore the rich history and stunning natural beauty of Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands from the sky. Surrounded by the sapphire blue sea, these two American territories offer surprises at every turn.

programme.desc: Swoop over America’s biggest, boldest, and most dazzling man-made structures. From the Statue of Liberty to the Seattle Space Needle, these American symbols of creativity rival the vast beauty of the country’s landscape.

programme.desc: Rainforests cover just six percent of Earth's surface yet contain almost half of the world's plants and animals. With a diversity of mammals, birds, and bugs unrivaled almost anywhere in the world, Panama's Barro Colorado Island is the perfect microcosm of nature. Every year, passionate and dedicated scientists gather to this oasis of life, scaling the treetops, from canopy to forest floor, in an attempt to unlock the secrets of the rainforest. Follow them as they explore how life thrives in one of the most complex habitats on Earth.

programme.title: Creatures Of The Lagoon
programme.desc: Marine biologists explore Florida’s Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

programme.title: Take US Home: Leeds United - El Loco

programme.desc: Leeds United must overcome a mounting injury crisis and show fighting spirit to maintain their challenge for promotion. Fanatical Leeds fan Josh Warrington faces Carl Frampton for IBF World Title.

programme.title: Beyonce & Jay-Z: Power Love
programme.desc: A merger of megastar music. Discover the true story of multi-genre performer and fashion promoter, Beyonce Knowles and the world's first hip hop billionaire, Jay-Z.

programme.title: Sacred Sites - Templars

programme.desc: Earthquake lights, hallucinogenic gases, and magnetic fields occurred nearly everywhere ancient Greek oracles delivered their prophecies. Voyage to the Mediterranean to investigate the connection between these soothsayer sites and tectonic phenomena.

programme.desc: Head into the hot American desert to try Cuban food at the magnificent Scott Resort. Then on to the Vegas strip and taste some mouth watering steak. and we eat some magnificent tortilla’s from the back of a food truck.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP20
programme.desc: Comfort food, American style. We try hearty burgers at a hipster burger joint in Washington DC, dumplings made from an age-old home recipe from a Chinese mum in Denver, Colorado and enjoy some comfort food from a lofty American brasserie.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP19
programme.desc: We check out what food the Bay Area has to offer, catching up with a local FM morning radio host and try some local fare in Palo Alto and then off to Oakland to visit an American Diner with a Japanese influence.

programme.title: Off-Menu - Amsterdam & Paris
programme.desc: As the capital of the Netherlands, Amsterdam is home to a plethora of historic sights and culinary delights. Paris can feel anchored in another time, while a dynamic food scene keeps evolving.

programme.title: Off-Menu - Dublin & Copenhagen

programme.title: Off-Menu - Barcelona & Rome

programme.desc: NYC's numerous urban and ethnic clusters have greatly influenced its food and culture. Washington, D.C. is home to all three branches of the government — but it’s not all politics and power suits.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 60: Hamsters - EP60
programme.desc: When Count BloodCount steals all the blood from the blood bank, Vampire Hunter Daffy Duck joins a frightened Porky Pig to get it back.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 61: Bugs Baked - EP61
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is filming an outdoor workout video. Bugs learns that part of Tad's fitness regimen involves eating an entire family of rabbits, so he seeks decides to teach Tad a lesson on camera.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 62: Vampire Me Love - EP62
programme.desc: With the threat of a snowy avalanche looming, it is up to Porky the Mountie to evacuate all the residents of the remote Canadian forest - unfortunately for him, Daffy is one of those residents.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 63: Tad Tucker Workout - EP63
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is filming an outdoor workout video. Bugs learns that part of Tad's fitness regimen involves eating an entire family of rabbits, so he seeks decides to teach Tad a lesson on camera.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 64: Canadian Bacon - EP64
programme.desc: With the threat of a snowy avalanche looming, it is up to Porky the Mountie to evacuate all the residents of the remote Canadian forest - unfortunately for him, Daffy is one of those residents.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 65: Bugs Bunny Saves The Universe - EP65
programme.desc: When the universe is in jeopardy, Bugs Sandraker joins a ragtag group of rebels on the Centennial Pigeon to save it from Dank Vapor (Marvin the Martian) in a sci-fi adventure.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 66: Hip Hop Hare (Part 1) - EP66
programme.desc: The easily riled Gabby Goat makes a stop at Porky Pig's Day Spa to try and relax.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 67: Hip Hop Hare (Part 2) - EP67
programme.desc: Jungle adventurer Daffy Duck is searching for a rare blue orchid. He and his assistant Porky Pig go spelunking down into a cave to find it, leading them to discover things that are treacherous.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 68: Gettin' You Goat - EP68
programme.desc: Claudette and Pepe Le Pew are ordered to the moon to stop evil Elmer Blofudd from destroying the world. The mission will be completed if Claudette can keep Pepe's focus on Blofudd instead of on her.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 69: Spelunkheads - EP69
programme.desc: After exposure to Wile E. Coyote's invention, Tweety Bird has the power to transform into Monster Tweety. When Sylvester tries to make Tweety his lunch, he is terrorised by this new menacing beast.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 70: Loon-Raker - EP70
programme.desc: Bugs finds himself in Area 51, and meets an intelligent Martian baby named Mot. He decides to help the adorable alien escape, but first they must get through four-star general Yosemite Sam.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 71: Angry Bird - EP71
programme.desc: Porky is on trial for a minor violation, and is assigned Daffy Duck as an attorney. What could go wrong?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 72: Area Fifty-Run - EP72
programme.desc: Tad Tucker is interviewed on the Shelley Lippa show in Sydney to talk about his lifestyle. When Bugs finds out that part of that lifestyle is eating rabbits, he decides to do make a fool out of Tad.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 73: Porker In The Court - EP73
programme.desc: After a plane crash, Porky and Daffy end up stranded on a deserted island together. Porky references a survival guide, while Daffy takes a more "wing it" approach.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 74: Tad The Skydiver - EP74
programme.desc: Elmer goes hunting for the title ingredient in his duck gumbo, but Daffy turns out to be not-so-cooperative prey.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 75: Duck Of The Flies - EP75
programme.desc: Rhoda Roundhouse wants to be the first to summit Mt. Killamesoftly, but with Bugs as her sherpa it's going to be more than your average uphill climb.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 76: Daffy In The Bayou - EP76
programme.desc: Porky's dream of a peaceful train ride is disrupted by fast talking, luggage-toting Petunia Pig.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 77: Bugs The Sherpa - EP77
programme.desc: Daffy is disrupting an office copy store, and Elliot charges his employee, Porky, with getting rid of the deranged duck.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 78: You Can't Train A Pig - EP78
programme.desc: Worried that he's gettign too old to be chasing dragons, Sir Littlechin mistakes Daffy for the mythical Phoenix, a creature who can replentish others' youthful vitality.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 79: Copy Quack - EP79
programme.desc: Daffy gate-crashes King Thes' fancy "luau" (traditional Hawaiian party) where he is treated like an honoured guest before realising the King has plans to offer him as sacrifice.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 80: Sir Littlechin And Th Phoenix - EP80
programme.desc: In 18th century Vienna, Leslie loses the job of new Court Composer to Daffy Duck. Leslie tries everything in his power to destroy Daffy, but will it be enough to overcome Daffy's mad genius?

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 81: Looney Luau - EP81
programme.desc: Taz tries to break in to Foghorn's chicken farm. Foghorn catches him, and then tries to educate Taz on how to be a better chicken thief.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 82: Amaduckus - EP82
programme.desc: When Elmer's cows get stolen, he sends Porky to enlist the help of Daffy the Gaucho to get them back.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 83: Fowl Me Once - EP83
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny sees Slugsworthy performing tricks in an act at Trey Hugger's aquarium, and becomes deteremined to set the elephant seal free.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 84: Daffy The Gaucho - EP84
programme.desc: Wile is thorwing an extravagant party to celebrate his newest invention, but not before Daffy falls in love with an ice sculpture

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 85: Free Slugsworthy - EP85
programme.desc: Cal thinks he has conquered everything in the entire world; everything, that is, except Bugs Bunny.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 86: Love Makes Me Daffy - EP86
programme.desc: Granny leaves Tweety at a paint-your-own pottery store, so Sylvester makes his move to snatch him up.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 87: Genghis Cal - EP87
programme.desc: Elmer hides out at his cottage in Leland, Michigan to write the Great American Novel, but Daffy ruins the peace and quiet.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 88: You're Kiln Me - EP88
programme.desc: Dorlock Holmes is summoned once again to solve a mystery, so he and his assistant Watkins head off to Granny's to investigate the case of the missing bird.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 89: Better Lake Than Never - EP89
programme.desc: Leslie wants to be the #1 Grandpa to his grandkids Paul and Pampreen Perdy. Unfortunately for him, Bugs decides to help make it happen.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 90: Deduce, Part Deuce - EP90
programme.desc: Porky and Thes fight for the affection of the same woman…via song.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 91: #1 Grandpa - EP91
programme.desc: The hilarious, heroic and mischievous Bugs Bunny you love is back! Follow Bugs in slapstick comedic shorts that find the iconic, carrot-loving rabbit matching his wits against classic characters.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 92: Porky And Thes, Part 1 - EP92
programme.desc: When Porky's new neighbor Marvin attempts to blow up the earth, Daffy has to save the day, with mixed results.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 93: Porky And Thes, Part 2 - EP93
programme.desc: When Bugs is mistaken for a wood fairy by Sir Littlechin, he opts to get rid of two bad guys at once by tricking Littlechin into believing Taz is an actual wood fairy.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 94: Men In Quack - EP94
programme.desc: The hilarious, heroic and mischievous Bugs Bunny you love is back! Follow Bugs in slapstick comedic shorts that find the iconic, carrot-loving rabbit matching his wits against classic characters.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 95: Littlechin And The Wood Fairy - EP95
programme.desc: The hilarious, heroic and mischievous Bugs Bunny you love is back! Follow Bugs in slapstick comedic shorts that find the iconic, carrot-loving rabbit matching his wits against classic characters.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 96: Tweet Team, Part 1 - EP96
programme.desc: The hilarious, heroic and mischievous Bugs Bunny you love is back! Follow Bugs in slapstick comedic shorts that find the iconic, carrot-loving rabbit matching his wits against classic characters.

programme.title: Time For Them To Come Home For Christmas
programme.desc: During the holidays, a woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 05: I Wish I Got The Credit I Deserve - EP5
programme.desc: Daniel struggles to understand his daughter’s new vocation. Ruby embarks on a scientific wish that helps bring them both to a meeting of the minds.

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: The classic 1960s animated series explodes on the screen in this dazzling live-action adaptation from the makers of The Matrix trilogy.

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: The classic 1960s animated series explodes on the screen in this dazzling live-action adaptation from the makers of The Matrix trilogy.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 01: Jack & The Beanstalk - EP1
programme.desc: Jack is black and the giant can rap in this retelling featuring the voices of Harry Belafonte and Tone Loc.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 02: Little Red Riding Hood - EP2
programme.desc: B.D. Wong and Vu Mai lend their voices to this animated episode of Little Red Riding Hood, retold in a Chinese setting.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 03: Hansel And Gretel - EP3
programme.desc: The Grimm Brothers' story of two hungry children and their encounter with a witch is retold with a Latino perspective.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 04: The Emperor's New Clothes - EP4
programme.desc: The well-known fable becomes a colorful Asian fairy tale featuring the voice of Gedde Watanabe as the vain emperor.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 05: Rumpelstiltskin - EP5
programme.desc: Robert Townsend and Denzel Washington lend their voices to this Caribbean-style version of the tale about a strange little man who can spin straw into gold.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 06: The Frog Prince - EP6
programme.desc: Sinbad is the voice of the lonely, enchanted frog who longs for the love of a princess. With Danny Glover, LeVar Burton and Jay Leno.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 07: Sleeping Beauty - EP7
programme.desc: Ricardo Montalban and Lucie Arnaz are the King and Queen in this Latino version of the fairy tale. Paul Rodriguez is the Jester.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 08: Rapunzel - EP8
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg really lets her hair down as Zenobia, the Hoodoo Diva, who keeps Rapunzel locked in a high tower in the bayou.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 09: The Valiant Little Tailor - EP9
programme.desc: David Alan Grier is the voice of the giant-vanquishing tailor in this African version of the fairy tale. With James Earl Jones.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 10: Cinderella - EP10
programme.desc: Daphne Zuniga is the voice of Cinderella and dances to a mariachi beat at the prince's ball in this Latino retelling. With Edward James and Jimmy Smits.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! And The Curse Of The 13th Ghost
programme.desc: Mystery Inc. heads for the icy slopes of the Himalayan mountains, chilling car chases, crystal balls and spine-tingling spells in this terrifyingly fun original movie!

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: Recent college grad Jaime Reyes returns home full of aspirations for his future, only to find that home is not quite as he left it.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Four zoo animals accidentally find themselves enroute to Africa, learning first-hand what life in the wild can be like in this animated family comedy.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: En route to New York via a penguin-piloted plane, the animals crash land in the plains of Africa where a surprise awaits. Stars Ben Stiller and Chris Rock.

programme.title: Regular Show: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally creating a Timenado, two slacker groundskeepers have to go back in time and battle an evil volleyball coach in order to save the universe... and their friendship.

programme.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
programme.desc: The adventure about a mustachioed plumber Mario and his lanky brother, Luigi, in their quest to save Princess Peach from villain Bowser.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: To live in Barbie Land is to be a perfect being in a perfect place. Unless you have a full-on existential crisis. Or you're a Ken.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 06: I Wish I Could Stop Pretending - EP6
programme.desc: Ruby helps bring a long-kept secret to light and changes a life. Daniel meets a business developer interested in Emerald whom he tries to win over.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 07: I Wish I Had Another Chance - EP7
programme.desc: The Emerald Apple Festival is back and so is a mysterious wish from the town’s festive past. Daniel and Paula revive the traditional apple cart race.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 08: I Wish I Could Find My Family - EP8
programme.desc: The stakes are very high as Ruby wrestles with how to solve a wish that hits close to home. Daniel’s in-laws come for a visit, reopening old wounds.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 09: I Wish I Could Get Back At Emma - EP9
programme.desc: A wish seems to ask Ruby and the others to take revenge into their hands. Mina stands her ground and refuses. Will Ruby learn something from this?

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 10: I Wish We’d Stayed Friends - EP10
programme.desc: In this wish from Emerald’s deep past, Ruby must resolve a family feud and misunderstanding before it’s too late. Meanwhile, the well is threatened.

programme.desc: Honey Daniels is a struggling hip hop dancer who's got all the moves, talent and relentless passion to succeed, and now her dream is just a step away.

programme.title: Apple & Onion S1 01: A New Life - EP1
programme.desc: Apple and Onion move to the city where they first meet.

programme.title: Apple & Onion S1 02: The Perfect Team - EP2
programme.desc: Onion worries his relationship with Apple is in jeopardy when a stray cat enters the picture.

programme.title: Apple & Onion S1 03: Tips - EP3
programme.desc: Apple and Onion have to find a way to ride the Hot Air Balloon which is in their town for one day only.

programme.title: Apple & Onion S1 04: Falafel's Fun Day - EP4
programme.desc: When Falafel decides to pack up and leave the city, Apple and Onion have to convince him to stay or they'll have to leave too.

programme.title: Apple & Onion S1 05: Apple's In Trouble - EP5
programme.desc: Apple is challenged to a fight by a grumpy Cheesesteak.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show S1 01: Spike Gets Skooled - EP1
programme.desc: Jerry is without a protector when Tom gets Spike sent away.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show S1 02: Cat's Ruffled Furniture - EP2
programme.desc: Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show S1 03: Sleep Disorder - EP3
programme.desc: Rick buys Ginger a new mattress with lots of features.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show S1 04: Tom's In-Tents Adventure - EP4
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry head to the great outdoors on a camping trip.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show S1 05: Birthday Bashed - EP5
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry must take over Tyke's puppy birthday bash.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show S1 06: Feline Fatale - EP6
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired to investigate a tuna can legacy.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 01: Omni-Copped - EP1
programme.desc: When Grandpa Max's engineer buddy Phil Billings gifts Team Tennyson the Omni-Copter - a state of the art flying vehicle that can transport the Rustbucket for overseas adventures.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 02: This One Goes To 11 - EP2
programme.desc: During one last stop by a toy store before Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max's maiden voyage across the Atlantic, Ben runs into an old bully, Kevin 11, who now has new powers - able to transform into aliens just like Ben, such as the "bootleg" doppelgänger of Cannonbolt-- Wreckingbolt!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 03: Moor Fogg - EP3
programme.desc: Team Tennyson goes international in the Omni-Copter and the first stop is for a hike in the Scottish Highlands, but the weather isn't just bad, it's foggy, and that means one thing and one thing only: the return of The Fogg!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 04: Rath Of Con - EP4
programme.desc: Back stateside, Ben can't get into a cat cosplay competition, Top Tail, without a costume of his own, but when he goes Rath - a new cat-like alien with an attitude - Ben's newfound wild side quickly becomes much more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 05: King Of The Castle - EP5
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max next travel to Castle Bishopbrook to visit a distant relative who's royalty, but when Ben encounters a "ghost" at the haunted home, it turns out to actually be his new rival, Kevin 11, throwing even more twisted aliens his way: Thornblade, Undertow, and Dark Matter!

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 97: Tweet Team, Part 2 - EP97
programme.desc: The hilarious, heroic and mischievous Bugs Bunny you love is back! Follow Bugs in slapstick comedic shorts that find the iconic, carrot-loving rabbit matching his wits against classic characters.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 98: Downton Wabby - EP98
programme.desc: When Old Man Montygrabs states his dear friend Bugs will inherit his mansion instead of his butler Leslie, he makes it his mission to destroy Bugs.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 99: Fowl Me Twice - EP99
programme.desc: Foghorn teaches his chickens the art of karate until Taz shows up. Then he has his hands full with his new star pupil.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 100: Hare To The Throne Part One - EP100
programme.desc: Before his home lake is drained away, Daffy as to step in to put the kibosh on Elmer Fudd's new artisinal mineral water bottling business.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S2 101: Hare To The Throne Part Two - EP101

programme.title: New Looney Tunes S3 02: The Wrong Brothers - EP2

programme.desc: The SVU helps a man come to terms with being victimized; Benson tries to support a victim's family when tragedy strikes twice.
